trans-unit.source: Specifies the localization attributes for a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)] class or class member.
trans-unit.target: 指定的當地語系化屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)]類別或類別成員。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be applied to a class, property, or method.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以套用至類別、 屬性或方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to use localization attributes, see [Localization Attributes and Comments](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用當地語系化屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[當地語系化屬性和註解](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute"></xref> class with a specified localization category.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute"></xref>指定的當地語系化分類的類別。
當地語系化類別目錄中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the category setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.
trans-unit.target: 取得當地語系化屬性的目標值的分類設定。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the modifiability settings of the localization attribute.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示當地語系化屬性的可修改性設定。

trans-unit.source: |Category setting|Meaning| |----------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Resource does not belong to a standard category.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A lengthy piece of descriptive text.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A single line of text, such as a title.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A short text string, such as a control label.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> or related control, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> or related control, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> or related control, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> or other panel that can contain text.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Font-related data such as font family, font style, or font size.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Inherits category from parent node.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Do not localize this resource.
trans-unit.target: |分類設定 |這表示 | |----------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|資源不屬於標準的類別目錄。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|冗長的描述性文字。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|單行文字，例如 標題。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|簡短文字字串，例如控制項標籤。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>或相關控制項。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>或相關控制項。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>或相關的控制項，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>或相關的控制項，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>或相關的控制項，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton>或相關控制項。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>或相關控制項。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>或相關控制項。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>或其他面板可以包含文字。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|字型相關資料，例如字型家族、 字型樣式或字型大小。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|類別繼承自父節點。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Do not localize this resource.</xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>

trans-unit.source: This does not apply to any child nodes of the resource.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Do not localize this resource, or any of its child nodes whose category is set to <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>.|
trans-unit.target: 這不適用於資源的任何子節點。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|這個資源，或任何其子節點的類別設為 不進行當地語系化<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>。 |</xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory> </xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>

trans-unit.source: The category setting of the localization attribute.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化屬性類別目錄設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the modifiability setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當地語系化屬性的目標值的可修改性設定。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the modifiability settings of the localization attribute.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示當地語系化屬性的可修改性設定。

trans-unit.source: |Modifiability setting|Meaning| |---------------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|Targeted value is modifiable by localizers.| |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|Targeted value is not modifiable by localizers.| |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|Targeted value's modifiability is inherited from its parent node.|
trans-unit.target: |可修改性設定 |這表示 | |---------------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|目標的值是由當地語系化的可修改。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|目標的值不是由當地語系化的可修改。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|目標的值的可變性都繼承自其父節點。 |</xref:System.Windows.Modifiability> </xref:System.Windows.Modifiability> </xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>

trans-unit.source: The modifiability setting of the localization attribute.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化屬性可修改性設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the readability setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當地語系化屬性的目標值的可讀性設定。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the readability settings of the localization attribute.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示當地語系化屬性的可讀性設定。

trans-unit.source: |Readability setting|Meaning| |-------------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|Targeted value is readable text.| |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|Targeted value is not readable.| |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|Targeted value's readability is inherited from its parent node.|
trans-unit.target: |可讀性設定 |這表示 | |-------------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|目標的值是可讀取的文字。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|目標的值不是可讀取。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|目標的值的可讀性繼承自其父節點。 |</xref:System.Windows.Readability> </xref:System.Windows.Readability> </xref:System.Windows.Readability>

trans-unit.source: The readability setting of the localization attribute.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化屬性可讀性設定。
